website_summaries.verdict: Sharpens scissors and knives large and small, with long-lasting results.
pros: The solid construction of this sharpener can handle coarse knives, pocket knives, and even kitchen scissors
Non-slip bottom keeps sharpener in place
Easy to use, with sharper knives in just seconds
cons: Some inconsistency reported in terms of sharpness of varying types of knife surfaces

customer_reviews.title: I used it on a vegetable knife that has been dull at best for ages
customer_reviews.text: My knife sharpener arrived Friday (sooner than expected) and I was curious to try it right away. I used it on a vegetable knife that has been dull at best for ages. It worked so quickly and effortlessly that I ended up using it on all of my knives right away. Specifically, I wanted to see if it would work on my serrated knives and it did a beautiful job! I would highly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Alclue

customer_reviews.title: Much better then expected.
customer_reviews.text: Did not disappoint. Usually this type of sharpener performs fair to moderate. However, after sharpening 11 Wusthoff knifes, I was very favorably impressed with the quality of it's performance. Knives returned to the sharpness of when they were new. Great sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Edward R. Abramson

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain, Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast, easy to use, and hold onto while sharpening. I sharpened (by now) 5 or 6 pairs of perfectly good scissors that had become useless before I sharpened them so easily. I also just sharpened all my kitchen knives that I use in cooking. Since my knives were expensive and liberally used, they really needed a good sharpening, and worked great with them as well. Thanks for offering this nice product at a nice price. It's got a nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Time & Effort Saver!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very please that the sharpener made quick work of sharpening our 25 knives of varying styles. It will be very easy to sharpen knives prior to or after use as butchers do to keep them always ready for the task. The sharpener looked large by the picture, it is very manageable and compact. I have some expensive sharpeners that don't provide this quality of sharpness unless considerable time is used to accomplish the task. The price is fabulous for the time that has been and will be saved, not to mention the pleasure of getting clean and easy cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this sharpener
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I did was sharpen all my knives. It did a great job. I noticed that the course side is very powerful and will easily remove metal shavings from the knife edge when pressure is applied while pulling a knife through the slot. Accordingly, I suggest caution when using this side. Easy on the downward pressure. I suspect that it is not necessary to use "course" each time. This is not a bad thing, just something to be aware of. Certainly a great feature when sharpening dull knives but should be used sparingly on reasonably sharp knives. Now that all my knives are quite sharp, I plan on mostly using the "fine" side for most of my resharpening.
customer_reviews.author: tektron

customer_reviews.title: Finally sharp knives!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a knife sharpener before, always thinking them to be sort of silly and taking up valuable counter or drawer space. My husband disagreed and so I gave in a bought this one. It actually is amazing. I had no idea how better life is with sharp knives. And this sharpener is compact and easily fits in a drawer without taking up too much space. It is simple to use and I really was surprised to realize that what I thought was "sharp" was not. So make your husband happy and buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Devin N. Negley

customer_reviews.title: One of the knives was extremely cheap while the rest were originally awesome but with time they became hard to work with
customer_reviews.text: I just got the sharpener tonight and put it to work on 6 blades that needed serious help. One of the knives was extremely cheap while the rest were originally awesome but with time they became hard to work with. Using the sharpener was extremely easy and the results were exceptional. Each knife now cuts at least as well as it did originally and it took no more than a minute per knife to get them back in shape. I have had an electric sharpener in the past and have to say that this did a much better job and was just as fast. I highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this on a variety of knives from good German knives to some cheaper older knives and it seems to work very well in putting a nice sharp edge on a blade. As with many of these types of sharpeners, depending on where the handle comes in contact, you cannot always sharpen the entire length of the blade. The same goes with scissors, some fit well in the sharpener and others are more problematic getting the cutting surface seated properly to sharpen well. But overall, easy to use, doesn't take much pressure, and puts a good edge on the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Mic McG

customer_reviews.title: This product most certainly gave my favorite sporting knives a new edge when before they couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This product most certainly gave my favorite sporting knives a new edge when before they couldn't cut through a piece of paper. This was a top rated product on many websites and while they gave my old knives a new blade, I couldn't help but feel that the desired edge was just a bit further out of reach. I suppose a $400 stone might be the path to glory and I shouldn't complain about a $20 sharpener which brought all my knives from nothing to beyond adequate, I guess I just wanted a slight bit more. Regardless, great product that produces great results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. I wish it worked.
customer_reviews.text: I don't really think this works well at all or I just received a horrible model. I have attached a picture to show that the ceramic portion of the sharpener is now rounded and it didn't sharpen my knives even when it wasn't rounded. It didn't really work out of the box. I wish I could write a 5 star review because having sharp knives is very important to my family. We cook all of our meals at home and rarely eat out (3-5 times a year).
customer_reviews.author: Toyo Yokoyama

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional customer service
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't quite as useful as I thought it would be. I mainly wanted to sharpen serrated steak knives. Noticed no difference in sharpness. Updated review...2/10/17 This didn't work as well for me as I hoped on my serrated knives but lo and behold, I received an email from the Zulay company several months after my purchase to offer me a refund or another knife sharpener because they saw my one star review. The customer service for this company is truly amazing. I would urge anyone to try their products, especially if you need to sharpen straight bladed knives. Kudos to their aim of complete customer satisfaction. 5 stars for Zulay Customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Microwave Magician

customer_reviews.title: MEH...
customer_reviews.text: After trying to sharpen knives for an hour, I gave up. Found my old, old plastic sharpener I paid $3.25 for and that sharpener did the trick on all the knives. Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: myke jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Made nicks and groves on my blade
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the way it changed my smooth blade into a blade with gouges in it.
customer_reviews.author: KBP

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I tried to sharpen a favorite pair of scissors and now they can't even cut a piece of paper. I followed the instructions. I wouldn't want to recommend this produce to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope S. Balint

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact size and it isn't too light or too heavy. The bottom is covered with a non-slip padding which is nice. I'm excited to start sharpening all of my knives!
customer_reviews.author: Bueller

customer_reviews.title: performance not good seems like a toy!
customer_reviews.text: I have a better handheld henkles sharpener that is 15 years old and is still working... I also have a Chefs choice electric sharpener that I use to go through all my knives once or twice a year. I just wanted a new quick sharpener to use on a weekly basis...this product doesn't fill that bill...will continue to look for an efficient handheld sharpener to use for touchup sharpenings Dave T.
customer_reviews.author: ramona etemadieh

customer_reviews.title: Don't use this on your kitchen knives
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really sharpen my knives. I followed the instructions but it didn't do anything for my knives. Instead it made the knives worse to the point where I couldn't cut meat nor vegetables. Ended up getting a Whetstone to resharpened my knives. Whetstones work way better and aren't super expensive so you're saving your money on this item
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice design, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: There are many sharpeners with this or similar designs. Some are identical, just sold under different names. It is a nice design, lightweight, and seems to be well made, and does a good sharpening job. I would like to know what the sharpening angle is, as most decent knives are ground to a specific designed angle that should be matched by the sharpener. Also, it would be nice if the ceramic rods could be swapped out and/or rotated to spread out the wear areas and extend the life of the rods (granted, that's a lot to ask of a $10 sharpener).
customer_reviews.author: David N

customer_reviews.title: Not worth what it cast.
customer_reviews.text: Unless. That is the best review I could give. I could not tell after running the blade through over thirty times any differences.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H.

customer_reviews.title: Will sharpen your knives
customer_reviews.text: I have some Rodgers chef knives that have always been a problem trying to keep sharp. After running through the sharpener on both sides, the finish on the blade is a lot more sharper than ever before. I know that I will have to work on the blade more often but when you have a knife that cuts it is worth it
customer_reviews.author: RJL

customer_reviews.title: Thing is total garbage
customer_reviews.text: Turned the fine straight edges on my blades into serrated. Total trash.
customer_reviews.author: El Cid

customer_reviews.title: Yes, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing a lot of cooking and prepping. I bought a pretty big kitchen knife. At first, it sliced through vegetables with such ease. After continued use, it was not quite as smooth. I bought this sharpener, and that cutting magic returned! It is fantastic. I sharpened other knives, smooth and serrated, and all cut so well!
customer_reviews.author: dsaladar

customer_reviews.title: Love this manual sharpener
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it. Have only had it for two days and several knives and one pair of scissors are now working away. Until I ordered this I had to rely on two of my sons to bring their knife sharpeners with them when they came to visit. Now I can sharpen 'whatever, whenever' and my tomatoes are now sliced and not mashed. I must say the Zulay people are very good as I had a question and got the answer within an hour after asking it. (it works for both right and left handed people) So glad I took a chance.
customer_reviews.author: GrammaD

customer_reviews.title: Worked great out of box,  didnt seem to last too long
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box it worked great. I sharpened about thirty knives and thought I finally found the answer. It seemed to not work as well and had to work to get the blades sharp. I thought it might continue to sharpen great for a longer period of time. I dont think the interior rods are rotating but sharpen on the same spot each time? It was great for the price, but wish it would have continued to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: I underestimated this tool, and it over-delivered. Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I like most of my purchases from Amazon, but rarely am I truly impressed. This is such an exception that I’m actually going to purchase another and gift it (and that’s something else I rarely do). All of my knives are like new, even the couple of crappy steak knives that need(ed?) to be thrown out. My scissors are amazingly sharp, and I kept them pretty sharp to start with. This blows away my little Fiskars manual sharpener. This sharpener really took me by surprise; I wasn’t expecting something so easy and effective. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JJ-J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Had a drawer full of dull knives. Used this to sharpen all of them!! Be careful, makes them razor sharp with just a few swipes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carisa M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t make the cut
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a sharpener for my scissors. I read the reviews and thought oh this is gonna be good finally I can have scissors at work. And it did not do the job. I have use this to the point of frustration trying to sharpen very dull scissors. Unfortunately, I can’t even cut a piece of thread. I am not sure I am doing something wrong it seems simple enough and I followed the directions. So I’m buying new scissors. My other scissors I will probably take to a professional sharpener along with some knives. I’m glad other people have had success with this and I am not so happy I have not
customer_reviews.author: Seako

customer_reviews.title: It does the thing
customer_reviews.text: You want a knife sharpener? this is it. I use my knife quite a bit for breaking down boxes and what not and having a dull blade is quite frustrating. this bad boy right here though?? Na. Them boxes never stood a chance, now it is like finessing a butter spread after its been left out over night to warm up and be nice and soft as you take your fancy butter spready thing and just glaze right through the whole process. Badda bing badda boom, baby. With this you can be Happy Stabby with them mfn boxes and not worry about getting stuck.
customer_reviews.author: MandaPanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have serrated Henckel knives and was nervous to use a sharpener on them. Some of them were incredibly dull from being used on a glass cutting board (I know, I was young and dumb, that thing went in the trash). This device worked amazingly! The serrated edges are sharper than ever! It's a great size for my small kitchen and looks great enough to leave out on the counter! I also really appreciated the personal email from the company, such amazing customer service and a very personable small company!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work at all, well it did dull my knives/scissors even worse than they were! Wanted to return but we put it so far in the back of the cabinet we forgot it! We ordered this with such enthusiasm, getting to sharpen our items quickly here at home. This sharpener is TERRIBLE! Every single item we tried to sharpen is ruined, terribly dull and I have to go pay to have them professionally done! Don't recommend this item at all!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J Adams

customer_reviews.title: We use this almost daily
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great tool for keeping our knifes sharp. The reason it's not a 5 score is that the description states that it sharpens serrated blades but we have not found that to be true. Aside from that, the price point was really good and it does work to sharpen our flat blade knifes. We swipe the knife through 15 times on the coarser side and then finish it up with 15 swipes on the finer side which gives us a nice sharp blade.
customer_reviews.author: Leann

customer_reviews.title: This does work...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this product. So many similar models and not sure if they do the job. I have knives that needed sharpening and this did the job. Knives were very sharp that I actually cut my finger cutting a potato. I'm sure that would not have happened before since the blades were a little dull. Very good working Knife Sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Castro

customer_reviews.title: Works on Straight and Serrated Knives
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item a week or so before Thanksgiving so as not to embarrass myself trying to slice the turkey with a dull knife! I'm pleased I did - this did an outstanding job of sharpening both my straight edge and serrated knives. I initially just used it on my carving knife for the old bird, but it worked so well I immediately took out every knife in my kitchen drawer and ran them through the sharpener. Since then, I've used it on everything from pocket knives to paring knives and it works like a charm. It's easy to hold, safe to use, and does a bang-up job getting your knives sharp!
customer_reviews.author: wsk

customer_reviews.title: Great little knife sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive instructions and when I iemailed about that, I received a prompt email with the instructions- which are very easy. The Zulay knife sharpener is very easy to use. The grip bar on the top is comfortable and allows you add extra support so that the sharpener stays in place. The material under the base adds friction also, but not enough without using the handle. It's very quick and easy- I sharpened all my Faberware knives and they are nice and sharp. The sharpener takes up very little space on my counter so I keep out. Different cutting boards dull knives quickly, but this sharpener takes care of the problem quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Tattersall

customer_reviews.title: Great sharpener and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the grating noise which my wife likens to fingers on a chalkboard (I feel where she's coming from, but it doesn't have the same effect on me, so I only sharpen when she's out of earshot), this little baby is a rock star in our kitchen. Knives are sharp all the time, even sharpened by Swiss Army knife to like new sharpness, and I can now have slices of tomato on my sandwiches rather than puree.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnymo

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked to receive use information with the product
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked to receive use information with the product, particularly any special directions for serrated knives. We experimented right away by sharpening dullest knives and so far seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Culpepper1

customer_reviews.title: This did a great job. Also
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a safe sharpener to sharpen my serrated blades. This did a great job. Also, I thought this sharpener came with a safety glove. This would help protect my wife when in use. It was not in the box. I would recommend this device to others!
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this at first because of the price. But it exceeded my expectations. Works very well so far. I have sharpened several older knives that i have had, and they cut through a tomato with ease. Just like the ones that advertise on TV. The only thing i would suggest is that you were a glove on whichever hand you do not have the knife in, just in case it slips off. Some of the more expensive brands come with a glove, but i just used one of my own.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Cheap alternative to buying new knives
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I have a set of cheap knives, I know. I'm not a gourmet chef, I just need something that cuts. This device has extended the life of my cheap knives and made my limited kitchen duties faster and easier,
customer_reviews.author: William J. Keaton

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: 1/5/2020 - My Cutco SERRATED bread and SERRATED trimmer knives had not been sharpened for at least, 5 years. The box indicated that some knives may require 55+ passes for sharpness restoration. Both knives required approximately 30 passes on the FINE slot but sharpness was restored. My STRAIGHT edged Wusthof - Gourmet and Classic - knives sharpness was restored on the COURSE slot in about 15 passes. The FINE slot was used to smooth surfaces. NOTE: The instructions were good but perhaps the words FINE and COURSE should be in BOLD font.
customer_reviews.author: Passenger

customer_reviews.title: Well Built
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple of my knives which have been dull for years and followed the instructions to sharpen them. I placed the Zulay sharpener on a paper towel to catch the metal dust. After a few coarse passes and about a dozen fine passes the Zulay sharpener held up well and left my knives sharper. It's very easy to use. I need to sharpen them a few more times to get the optimum sharpness. I like this knife sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: AnimeFanatix

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money. Cost me a $100 knife!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Do not purchase. I watched the video on how to use and sharpen knives and scissors. Ruined a $100 knife and 4 pair of scissors. Absolutely the worst purchase ever. I returned it for a refund. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Turnham

customer_reviews.title: Keeps all my knives razor sharp
customer_reviews.text: I love cooking and i do a lot of prep work, like cutting, slicing, and chopping vegetables as well as trimming and cutting different types of meat and poultry, so and having sharp knives are important to me. I use this sharpener everyday to keep my knives as sharp as possible. Its easy to use and easy to hold. No cons absolutely love this sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: michael marinelli

customer_reviews.title: What a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sisters since they are always cooking for family get-togethers. They really liked the thought since it is hard to keep a sharp knife in Texas when cooking Fajitas which are absolutely delicious. They really liked the sharpeners since they are very easy to use and they can really sharpen a knife.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Daniel

customer_reviews.title: So far, SO good!
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely a great sharpener for the price. I revitalised nearly all my knifes, straight & serrated, within 30-45 minutes. Do use it on a towel and/or cutting board, though, to avoid blunting your knives on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and safe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and took one to my mom as she was complaining that all of her knifes were dull. I spent over an hour sharpening a lot of knifes and I now have a very happy mom! I really like that it provides safety as your hand that holds the Sharpener is away from the knifes as you run them through the sharpener. I will now be sharpening knifes in two households for a long time. Excellent, sturdy product that works.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Dog's Mom

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I just received the sharpener and sharpened two knives. So far so good. I don't know about the durability of the sharpener but it is not flimsy. It is easy to hold and to use. The picture online looks bigger than the actual product. But that is fine. It is small enough to put away in a drawer, so I can store it out of the way. I like the design &I think I will like using it.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: It left metal shards on the shelf where I used it
customer_reviews.text: It worked great. Next time I would set it on a paper towel to catch and easily dispose of the metal shards. I only tried it so far on a chef's knife that had lost it's ability to cut anything. It worked better than I expected for something of that price. Happy that I purchased it. . . hopefully I can put an edge on all my knives rather than replacing them, I hope it does all the rest as well. . .
customer_reviews.author: Margaret-Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: Does not last Works great at first, but the stones do not last very long. Last replacement I got at no charge did not even last more than a couple of uses. The wear on the stones are very inconsistent. a previous order lasted me several months and I was very pleased. But last two orders did not last long at all. I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: LorieM

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife Sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a couple of months ago and would like to say the product is amazing, It is safe to have around pets and children and performs it's function. It can easily be placed on a flat surface and with light pressure on the handle secures a safe sharpen. Great product for those that need safe tool to sharpen kitchen knives
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will sharpen one SERRATED knife
customer_reviews.text: Great sharpener, will sharpen serrated as well as straight knives. Most hand held sharpeners will not sharpen serrated knives, this one will and you can't beat the price. UPDATE worked on one knife, all knives thereafter it did not work, did not sharpen any of the remaining knives that I tried to sharpen.
customer_reviews.author: Lman

customer_reviews.title: When you really need “sharp”....
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a few days. My specific purpose was to get more life out of my decades-old serrated bread knife. First project right out of the box. Well! Left me a smooth very fine edge in just a few strokes, and I’m back to making reliable thin slices without squashing the loaf. Very pleased with that! Left the sharpener next to the knife block — using it whenever I take out a knife still needing sharpening. No complaints. Even enjoyed the tickler nite from the company to write a review — included the instructions in the text. Good reinforcement! Recommended ,
customer_reviews.author: JohnF

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife Sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a small, roundish knife sharpener and haven't had the greatest of luck with it. This knife sharpener works like a charm!! I just followed the instructions and, behold, I had two very sharp knives. I'm so glad I bought it! I recommend it to anyone looking to keep their knives sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy C.

customer_reviews.title: Right out of the box, it proved itself
customer_reviews.text: This is so nicely designed and it works well. Right out of the box, I sharpened a dull knife then used it to carve a roast. Sweet! Soooo easy to cut the meat! What a price, too. It works well on my serrated and unserrated knives. What a simple pleasure. As anyone knows who cooks, a sharp knife is a must. This little diamond-get it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Kodgis

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for serrated knife
customer_reviews.text: The item description is wrong this will not sharpen serrated knives at all 0%. Don't waste your money if that's what you're buying this for. I wouldn't say it really does that great of a job on the rest of the knives but they definitely are sharper
customer_reviews.author: Rome

customer_reviews.title: One of the best little gadgets!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget works great and is easy to store in kitchen drawer without taking up much space. Should come with directions though because it has two sharpening options and I didn't know why (maybe one is used for serrated knife and the other for straight edge knife?) That's the only reason that I gave it a 4. Worked great on both serrated and straight edged knife
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sharpener
customer_reviews.text: This is just the sharpener to keep my filet and kitchen knives sharp as a razor. Easy to use, and will restore any blade in just a few swipes through the slot. I highly recommend it and have purchased two of them for myself, one for my home in Florida and the other for my cabin to keep a sharp edge on my hunting and fishing knives.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Works, But?
customer_reviews.text: Sharpens well, only beefs I have is #1- You can not sharpen up to the handle, only starts to sharpen a little over a half an inch from handle. #2- it's bulky. #3 it's pricy. When I bought this I also bought a smaller one at the same time, that turned out to be more functional and sharpened as well and sharpened closer to the handle --- was only $5.99!
customer_reviews.author: B. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I don't often write reviews, but this product impressed me. My favorite cooking knife has been dull for a while now, and I decided to try out this sharpener. The instructions say you only need to run the blade through a few times, and I was skeptical that it would actually help. But, it really did work and needless to say, I was impressed enough that I came back to Amazon to write this review. Good product. Worked VERY well after 1 try.
customer_reviews.author: Adam G

customer_reviews.title: Is this product too good to be true?
customer_reviews.text: Everything went as promised and it arrived in one day. It took a few strokes to get the proper motion, but I was very pleased with the results on some knives that were quite dull. I have sharpened a dozen or so knives with surprising ease, and if this product lives up to its promised lifetime use, it will easily prove to be the best investment I have made in at least 40 years of searching for a quick, easy means of keeping my kitchen and utility knives sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This product works beautifully. We sharpened cutting knives and it made a huge difference. Since I have a little arthritis in my hands, having a sharp knife makes a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: vs. kitchellence brand
customer_reviews.text: good design. have another brand I have worn out, this design is more stable, and more able to avoid hitting knife tip on the sharpener. The kitchellence did have a 3rd slot to remove rough spots that is nice for a blade that has suffered from use.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is crazy good. Just sharpened five knives and they are like ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is crazy good. Just sharpened five knives and they are like new again. Can't believe how sharp my knifes are. They are so sharp their dangerous. Wow!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very picky about his knives and has carefully sharpened them by hand for years. We have a least one knife that is over 20 years old. He started getting them sharpened at the grocery store, but it was not only expensive but didn't seem to work well. I bought him this for Christmas and he uses it all the time and says it works well. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nigel's favorite

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! My knives were not super dull, so just used the honing slot and it made difference! Did both straight edge and serrated. Super easy to use and easy to store.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth Buying
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SHARPENER! Super easy to use and definitely does the job right. I loved having my knifes sharp. Being a mother to 5 I do a lot of cooking so chopping, dicing and mincing is an every day thing. I will definitely be purchasing this product again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G

customer_reviews.title: Knife sharpener for serated and straight edge knives
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! I lone this. I just received it, used it and my 20 + year old serated knives now have a new life! Thank you. I might get another twenty years out of them.... What a find. It is easy to use, comfortable to work with and a great buy! I highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: spirits&angels

customer_reviews.title: Terrific !
customer_reviews.text: The sharpener arrived right on time. I quickly pulled out my very old and dull knife and in just a few quick swipes my knife was greatly improved. So glad I bought this. I had considered buying a new knife but now I'er saved a ton of money. This works great.
customer_reviews.author: AgnesMooney

customer_reviews.title: Does the job beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Sharp knives are essential even for the home cook. This sharpener is so well designed there is little or no chance of my cutting myself in the process of sharpening my knives. Then best general use knife sharpener I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Rand B. Lee

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Got the sharpener today in the mail.. i was having trouble with my one pairing knife, kept ripping plastic bags when i tried to cut them open.. i ran the knife through it a couple of times.. and then cut open a bag so i can make supper and it cut right though with out a issue.. cant wait to do my other knives...
customer_reviews.author: Bryan G.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient sharpening tool for anyone
customer_reviews.text: Very handy knife sharpener. Even though I have the best coarse, fine & Arkansas finishing sharpening stones, this is easier to use. My hands are arthritic and appreciate a good, sharp knife when needed. I even got a good edge on a stainless steel knife which had been impossible for me to get a sharp edge manually.

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality. Super sharp. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a high volume kitchen and can't believe how much they pay for knife sharpening when this sharpener is less than $20.... I sharpened my ENTIRE personal kitchen set (8 or 10 fine knives) , 3 pocket knives, 2 kitchen shears, and my fishing filet kit... And it didn't even take an hour. I even sharpened my camping hatchet to the point I can slice a sheet of paper... I didn't know that was even possible. If I would have known how good this sharpener was I'd have paid $100.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great little sharpener,actually works!

customer_reviews.title: I like the knife sharpener and think it will work fine

My spouse is used to sharpening knives with a whet stone and getting them razor sharp so he's not all that impressed but I think it's going to fit my needs just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bodine from austin, tx

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!

The friendly email to make sure i received my sharpener along with a how to reminder on how to use the sharpener was wonderful. I will be letting all my friends and family know about the Zulay Premium Quality Knife Sharpener.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Works soooo well!!
customer_reviews.text: This knife sharpener is a really, really good one! It is sturdy, works great on my old faithful years-old knives that I am just not ready to part with. This little gadget quickly and with very little effort on my part made them as sharp as if they were brand new. Super glad that I ordered this knife sharpener!
customer_reviews.author: Cindyann

customer_reviews.title: ... couple knives with it but thus far but works great! One was bad enough to use the rough ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only sharpened a couple knives with it but thus far but works great! One was bad enough to use the rough sharpener first then the fine and now it is like cutting a hot knife through butter as they say. I will continue using it on the other blades in my kitchen and have no doubt it will change my cooking/preparing experience. I cook 80-90% of our family meals and having a sharp knife as we all know makes a world of a difference. Further more it was at a great price that was very reasonable, producing sharp results.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: So I'm convinced that the large number of great reviews were right-on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and daughter-in-law. It arrived yesterday. My son used it on one knife immediately and said it was the sharpest knife he had ever felt. So I'm convinced that the large number of great reviews were right-on :-)
customer_reviews.author: Doug Fay

customer_reviews.title: Sharpens my blades in no time
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Effective. The sharpening end is removable/can be flipped around if you are opposite-handed or just like the fine/coarse sections on a specific side, for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: It ruined our fabric scissors.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and was really excited to sharpen our fabric scissors. Well, it appears I’ll be buying a new pair because this completely ruined them. After numerous attempts the blade of the scissors are more dull than before we sharpens them. This is a NO FOR SHARPENING SCISSORS. Worked well on a kitchen knife.

customer_reviews.title: Great sharpener

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Best and easiest to use sharpener I have ever owned! Compact for storage and stable in use. Exceptional quality at a bargain price. Fast delivery, too! Get all of your knives ready for all of the holiday prep work.
customer_reviews.author: Empress Mary

customer_reviews.title: Stay sharp.
customer_reviews.text: I love this sharpener! I have a really nice set of knives and I cook everyday. After each use, I clean off my knives and give them a quick sharpening. It's like my knives are brand new everytime I use them.
customer_reviews.author: HMC

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I used this sharpener to sharpen my pocket knife, some kitchen knives and scissors. It seems to work very well. If I could make one suggestion, it would be to include a little more specific instructions, especially on serrated knives. I realize there are instructions on the box but some of us don't have a lot of experience with sharpening. Perhaps you could consider including more detailed instructions, such as the angle to hold the blade, perhaps to include drawings to illustrate important points. I very much appreciate your efforts to provide a superior product and great customer service. Keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.author: J Spenard

customer_reviews.title: Very good instructions and sharpening
customer_reviews.text: Fixed my expensive knives in a few passes, making quick work of a cantaloupe and the evening meat. Nice they sent an email with a few simple tricks to its use.

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT do scissors correctly
customer_reviews.text: It's great for knives, light weight and all good but ruined every pair of scissors. I followed what directions said to do, and re-read directions again. Something is wrong - to beware. Does knives perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn kilday

customer_reviews.title: Sharpest knives in town.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I received the sharpener I went to work sharpening all my kitchen knives. It is as easy as they say it is. I tried using the other sharpeners I had but it just wasn't cutting it. No pun intended. I have Chicago Cutlery, Serco, J A Henckels and a few lesser knives like Mad Hungry. They are all sharp know. I'm a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: One of the best I’ve used

My biggest complaint is that there is a lot of handle and I would like to see a design that allows me to replace the sharpening stone and steel without replacing the entire thing.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of knives that are probably 40 years old. I used the Zulay sharpener and they now cut like they are brand new. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of this product. Also I didn't know when purchasing that they are a small business located in the US.

customer_reviews.title: Solid build and simple instructions
customer_reviews.text: I just received this sharpener so these comments are my initial response only. The design is simple and efficient, and the instructions are very straight forward. I believe it will serve my purpose quite well, but as it is backed by a very generous refund policy, this is a no lose proposition for the buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Morris

customer_reviews.title: not that it is better than other similar sharpeners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sharpener, not that it is better than other similar sharpeners, but because it is much safer with a secure hand hold to keep the sharpener from moving as you draw the knife thru the two different sharpening slots. It even does a fair job on serrated knives, surprisingly.
customer_reviews.author: Keith L. Seidenstricker

customer_reviews.title: It is a great tool to have and now my knives and scissors ...
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking to purchase a knife sharpener for awhile, especially since I found out that my local hardware store wanted $15 to sharpen a single carving knife! Knife sharpeners that I had seen were expensive, until I looked at Amazon and saw the Zulay. The price was incredible and as a bonus it does scissors, too! It is a great tool to have and now my knives and scissors have been given new life! I am very pleased with the Zulay Knife Sharpener and I recommend it highly
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Give Edges Just as Promised!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using an electric three-step Chef's Choice knife sharpener for years. I thought I'd try the Zulay sharpener -- it wasn't much of financial risk. The Zulay is amazing...extremely sharp edges with virtually no effort; and much more convenient than the electric it's fully replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Michael - Desert-Rat

product_meta.title: Zulay Premium Quality Knife Sharpener for Straight and Serrated Knives Stainless Steel Ceramic and Tungsten - Easy Manual Sharpening for Dull Steel, Paring, Chefs and Pocket Knives
feature_bullets: REVIVE, RESTORE AND FINE TUNE YOUR KNIVES We all need our knives to perform their best. This handheld 2 stage knife sharpener is the easiest and fastest way to restore that sharp, shiny edge your knives need for top performance. All you have to do is pull your knife through the sharpener to get the edge back! Plus, the black and chrome color scheme will look great in your kitchen.

PUT A FRESH EDGE ON THE DULLEST KNIFE Say goodbye to the dull edges in your life. It takes just a few swipes to experience beautifully sharpened knives. The coarse slot revives dull or damaged blades, while the ceramic slot hones and polishes the blade to fine perfection. The non-slip padded bottom keeps the sharpener steady on any surface. Smart design nestles comfortably in any drawer or counter top.

TOTAL TIME SAVER It's way more fun to slice, chop, mince and prep with a sharp knife. Enjoy your time in the kitchen doing what you love, instead of dealing with dull, ineffective knives. Turn your worst knife into your sharpest, most reliable kitchen friend. Works great on scissors!

SAVE THAT MONEY Salvage your old set of knives and scissors instead of spending a small fortune on a new set. You can sharpen all your dull hunting, kitchen or pocket knives and restore them back to their full glory. Decade-old knives have been revived in a few seconds with this versatile sharpener. Don't take our word for it, try this sharpener and if it does not sharpen your knife, we will refund you in full no questions asked.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED OR YOUR MONEY BACK We put our money where our mouth is. We make a superior quality kitchen knife sharpener that we know you will love so we are betting on it. If you are not 100% satisfied we will make it up to you with an instant full refund. We care that every single one of our customers are happy. Also, if it ever wears out we have a replacement warranty simply email us and we will answer in 24 hours. You have nothing to lose, get your knife sharpener today.
